params._ydToken: Address of the YD Token contract

params.priceInYD: Price in YD Token (0 decimals, so 10 = 10 tokens)

returns.courseId: The ID of the newly created course

returns._0: Total balance collected for the course
Array of course IDs purchased by the user
Whether the user has purchased the course

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.isActive: Whether the course should be active

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

hasUserPurchased(address,uint256).notice: Check if user has purchased a course

setCourseActive(uint256,bool).notice: Set course active status (only course author)
